definition: to patronize/to support/to praise/(Internet slang) to like (an online post on Facebook etc)
to approve of/to endorse/(vote) in favor
to praise/to approve of/to show approval
to praise without cease (idiom); praise sb to high heaven
to give sb a thumbs-up (on social media)

sentences.english: The local superstitions regarding the dead were the perfect cover for Evazan's project.
sentences.chinese: 當地對死亡的迷信爲埃瓦讚的項目提供了完美的掩護。

sentences.english: However, we never praise cults for they encourage people to commit wrongdoings.
sentences.chinese: 如果是叫人造罪業墮三途的邪教，我們絕對不讚嘆。

sentences.english: Looking at the night sky, bright stars who don't admire infinite universe?
sentences.chinese: 遙望星光燦爛的夜空，誰不讚嘆宇宙的無窮？

sentences.english: Her sister praised cheung Po tsai for father try dew filial, make cheung Po tsai in a good mood.
sentences.chinese: 娣妹大讚張保仔爲父試甘露盡孝，令張保仔心情大好。

sentences.english: P. g. 67 shows his pomposity and his status earned by association with her.
sentences.chinese: 說明他的大讚誇詞和通過她所贏得的地位。

sentences.english: The dramatic increase in internet users during the past 10 years has been remarkable to witness.
sentences.chinese: 近10年來互聯網用戶迅猛增加，凡目睹者無不讚嘆。

sentences.english: Awesome bed designed to be as comfortable and cozy as a nest.
sentences.chinese: 這張超讚的牀被設計成一個舒適愜意的巢。

sentences.english: Yeah, the players are really very skillful. I wish I could play that well.
sentences.chinese: 是，他們球技太讚了，真希望我也能打的那麼好。

sentences.english: There are wonderful old towns, castles and museums to visit.
sentences.chinese: 那裏有很讚的老城鎮，城堡和博物館供你參觀。

sentences.english: Why does this video have more likes than dislikes? This is clickbait. ?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼點讚的比討厭多？這只是個釣魚視頻。

sentences.english: He has won plaudits for his energetic response to the earthquake in L'Aquila.
sentences.chinese: 阿奎拉地震他積極反應，各界讚口不絕。

sentences.english: Clearly the last chapter of the Fezzan is yet to be written.
sentences.chinese: 其實，費讚的最後篇章仍然在寫。

sentences.english: Rather, big sponsors tend to be firms with brands that are already well-known.
sentences.chinese: 相反，大讚助商常是那些品牌家喻戶曉的公司。

sentences.english: Zhong Hao regret, praising the Shishu true hero.
sentences.chinese: 忠豪遺憾不已，大讚師叔真英雄。

sentences.english: Did he always say thanks for a tasty meal?
sentences.chinese: 他會爲一頓美食而讚口不絕嗎？

sentences.english: Couple this with a great pen and life really doesn’t get much better!
sentences.chinese: 要是再配上一隻絕讚的筆，生活就沒治了。

definition: to patronize/to support/to praise/(Internet slang) to like (an online post on Facebook etc)
to make up (one's face)/to dress/(of one's dress) beautiful
to like (an online post on Weibo, Facebook etc)
attractiveness index (rating of how good-looking sb is)
to bestow (a reward)/to give (to an inferior)/to hand down/a reward (bestowed by a superior)/to appreciate (beauty)
to thank/to apologize/to wither (of flowers, leaves etc)/to decline
to feel happy/to rejoice/to have a great time/to make fun of sb
